visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 300600 and n.kpiId=100252 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=100252 RETURN   n.recordDate as recordDate , n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY recordDate DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 300600 and n.kpiId=100253 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=100253 RETURN   n.recordDate as recordDate , n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY recordDate DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 300600 and n.kpiId=100254 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=100254 RETURN   n.recordDate as recordDate , n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY recordDate DESC
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 300600 and n.kpiId=100112 RETURN n.recordDate as recordDate , n.avgOutput as avgOutput ORDER BY n.executionId LIMIT 5

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 300600 and n.kpiId=100901 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=100901 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Bugs as Bugs,n.Vulnerablilities as Vulnerablilities,n.CodeSmell as CodeSmell ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 300600 and n.kpiId=100903 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=100903 and n.StoryTypes in ['PaymentServices','MobileServices','ClaimFinder','AgentLocator'] with n return distinct n.StoryTypes as StoryTypes ,toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.Duration))) as Duration
